website_summaries.verdict: A premium bathroom mirror that is sleek, versatile, and easy to set up.
pros: Frame includes a dazzling finish designed to complement any bathroom's decor
Comes with 4 D-ring hangers that enable you to quickly and effortlessly hang the mirror on a wall
Mirror can be set up horizontally or vertically
Sold in a variety of stunning frame finish colors
cons: Plastic frame is cheap and flimsy
Less durable than many comparable bathroom mirrors

customer_reviews.title: MCS Mirror Makes Our Bathroom Look Great
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 of these mirrors and mounted them between the faucets and wall fixtures over a white double sink vanity. They look great and were simple to hang. They are a gloss white (not matte). Definitely recommended, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Coach KG

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: We redid our bathroom and I got discouraged while looking for mirrors because of how expensive they were. I just wanted a simple (but not cheap looking) white one for a reasonable price. I found it here!! I couldn’t be happier with the price and the looks of this mirror. It was exactly what I was looking for! I did buy a separate mounting bracket on Amazon as well, which worked out great. Incredibly happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to finish off my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased several bedroom sets from a well known "Swedish" furniture store but every time we bought a bedroom set, they always had everything EXCEPT the mirror for over the dresser. This is almost exactly like the one the store advertised but never had in stock. The perfect finish to a bedroom set or hallway--just perfect! It can be hung either length or width wise.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne M. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Came nicely packed. Very light weight and easy to install. We used this mirror for our powder room. It was the perfect size. Mirrors can be expensive, but this one was cost friendly and I’m glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: 30 Year Old Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again without hesitation
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent item, well made and looks more expensive than it cost. My only regret is that I did not purchase the larger size for only $10 more!! You will need to add picture frame wire across the back to hang this mirror, but with the sturdy weight it will be a plus. Use a needle nose pliers and or a flat head screw driver to get all the staples out of the cardboard, corner protectors on the mirror. It was a bit of a challenge but the mirror is in perfect condition so won't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia M.

customer_reviews.title: Next time I'll check Amazon first!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a wall mirror for above a chest of drawers. I looked everywhere and couldn't seem to find exactly what I was looking for. I came across this mirror, read the good reviews and ordered it. I was still nervous though as I truly am a picky person. It arrived today, fast shipping, and packed VERY well. It is beautiful and just what I wanted. It looks great above my dresser. I'm very happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Honestkaty

customer_reviews.title: Not all I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: I saved $20 from Home Depot with this simple white mirror... however, when it came I noticed black marks in the mirror as you can see from photos below. Also, the hardware on the back of the mirror isn't centered, so you have to move it to hang it in portrait format. Also, the miters in the corners have too much space in them to look quality. With a few minor quality controls put in place this could be a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, substantial mirror
customer_reviews.text: It's really good looking. The frame detail, the well-aligned mitered corners, the matte finish all make for a piece that can be installed in any room. I followed the installation directions exactly and it took a lot more than just attaching picture wire (which I intended to use but the manufacturer cautioned against) to get it hung. It took a measuring tape, drill, level, anchor screws and screw driver instead. But I'm well-satisfied with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Jozie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! We were remodeling our half bath and were shocked at how expensive mirrors were. After searching online we found this and it was exactly what we wanted. It was inexpensive but it looks very elegant and is just as nice as the $150+ ones we were looking at in store!
customer_reviews.author: Zwilling

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Love the mirror! Wasn't hard to put up and so far has held up quite well. I do wish they offered it in a larger size, but otherwise nothing bad to say. Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ray

customer_reviews.title: This mirror has been great to have
customer_reviews.text: This mirror has been great to have. I'm not having to go the bathroom to look in the mirror any longer to just double check everything! I have a 2 year old who isn't allowed in the bathroom but every time I try to go in he is right there. This has saved a lot of struggling with him. Happy toddler happy mom. Plus it looks great in our house. :) Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: good quality mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to go over our new double vanity. Very pleased with the color ( white) and quality and it really improves the bathroom. We had 1 big mirror so this is such a change for the better.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A Thiel

customer_reviews.title: A must have to brighten any space
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mirror to accent a hall at the end of my hall. However, I wanted the black frame since I have black hardwood flooring. The black frame was more expensive than the white one by $15 bucks or so, so I bought the white one and spray painted it black. Highly recommend doing this if you want a different colored frame. The mirror itself is wonderful and makes any space in the house look brighter and larger. Great price as well makes this a must purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Decent only
customer_reviews.text: If you need something basic, this will be fine. The materials and alignment are not the greatest, but I guess it is somewhat expected for this price point. I did add some extra reinforcement to ensure it doesn’t fall.
customer_reviews.author: mso328

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice and the price seems about right
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and the price seems about right. I ordered this for a rental unit so I gave it to my contractor to install to be on the safe side. I took a look at the installation hardware on the back and decided not to chance it. I was a little miffed because the Pewter wasn't available when I ordered it but it is now .
customer_reviews.author: gerardine cizmar

customer_reviews.title: Well made..but
customer_reviews.text: The mounting holes are different from one mirror to another. (we bought two) Still, they are nicely made and look good. BTW, for any Californian's, these are what you folks call "Me'ers".
customer_reviews.author: D. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our bathroom! These mirrors were exactly what we were looking for at the right price. Both were in great condition, the hangers on the back made them a sinch to hang, and they are light enough to not need anchors!
customer_reviews.author: ChristyBee

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the mirror for the price. The size is nice, it looks like a higher quality mirror once hung; however, I ordered two (one in white, one in black) and the top right hand corner of the black mirror has hardened glue that oozed out and it’s on the glass. I’m not sure how this would have made it through a quality control inspection? Very frustrated as this mirror is to be hung in a main living area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mirror because there weren’t any mirrors in any of the bathrooms in the house. It goes perfectly over the sink in our guest bathroom. It looks like it’s worth more in person than what I actually paid for it. Very pleased with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bathroom mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a cute and simple bathroom mirror for a little while when I found this one on Amazon. It was simple and classic and I knew it would be a great fit for my bathroom. When it came, it was exactly what I wanted! Very pretty and perfect addition in my bathroom. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as big as expected but hats my bad for not checking measurements. All in all I was Happy with this purchase. It’s a beautiful mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a small bathroom and after hanging It up, it looks really nice. Surprised at the quality. Will definately do the trick for a small bathroom or even half bath.
customer_reviews.author: erin0525

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for newly remodeled vanity area!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for smaller vanity area - we have two installed over our bathroom sinks. The brushed 'metal' effect matches our nickel faucets perfectly. The bevel in the mirror makes them look much more expensive than they were - lucky me!!
customer_reviews.author: PKHolden

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror to hang over a small cabinet and it is so perfect. The quality and style are exactly what I expected and for the money it exceeded my expectations. The be red glass and pewter frame make it look more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: LL in SD

customer_reviews.title: High quality good value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 mirrors for our bathroom remodel. We saved alot of money by not purchasing the mirrors with our new vanity. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Carol RN93

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sooooo happy I bought this mirror! I wanted something very plain, but also classy to hang in the kitchen/living room area. It's a great size and I was really impressed by the quality. I was afraid it might look cheap but it's really nice and good staple for any house.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive. Has improved the look of the bathroom exponentially since replacing the old 70's-style medicine cabinet with this lovely mirror
customer_reviews.author: Ann Weindel

customer_reviews.title: It's light enough that you probably won't need nails to hang this if you have some good double-sided mounting tape
customer_reviews.text: Very budget-friendly mirror and it doesn't look cheap at all. I got it for my vanity and it fits the bill. It's light enough that you probably won't need nails to hang this if you have some good double-sided mounting tape. It doesn't exactly look expensive but it's good enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this unless you are going for a cheap look.
customer_reviews.text: My child could have made this. The seams at each corner had gaps in them like glue had not fully dried or something. It was so cheap looking, I had to go and buy another and better option - in person. Buying online with a picture does not tell the full story. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Stewart

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to repackage
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered had a mark on the mirror....it was easy to repackage, the replacement came really quickly (1-2 days). This is a quality mirror; great price for a well made piece. there is a paper back with hooks...beautiful mirror that is perfect for the powder room I ordered it for. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hines

customer_reviews.title: Mounting a little hairy, but nice mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent mirror. Good framing. Mounting could have more options and better ones at that.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Swogger

customer_reviews.title: Great look but odd fog to glass
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these mirrors. I ordered 2 for my master bath. The glass almost seems fogged sometimes. The one came ripped on the back but wasnt worth the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I'd say I didn't like was that it's not flush with the wall. But it's good quality.
customer_reviews.author: jtbl90

customer_reviews.title: Loving our new mirror
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this mirror for our new home. After a bit of measuring, my husband was able to easily install it. Looks great in our half bath and guests love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Serena S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mirror the hooks weren’t placed where I expected them to be like on the top of the mirror they are on the side honestly think it makes it more secure but was hard to get it to be perfect very happy with the mirror !
customer_reviews.author: Emmalemma

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the quality of this mirror! Something similar in Home Depot would be double the cost, easy! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Bang for you buck!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice modern mirror. It’s bigger then I expected & it’s light weight which is a plus. This is a replacement for a mirror I had from bed bath and beyond that cost double what I paid for this one & I like this one MUCH BETTER! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Latifya R.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged glass
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived promptly, box was intact, but when the box was opened the mirror had a dent/ding on it. I didn’t send it back because it was purchased to be hung as decor for a Christmas gathering and I didn’t want my guest bathroom to be without a mirror, but unfortunately I am now stuck with this damaged mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mirror so much I ordered another one!
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a fancy mirror but it’s good quality and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: ruby red

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: I was about to make my own mirrors until I found these. Very very nice
customer_reviews.author: dmiami123

customer_reviews.title: It's a mirror
customer_reviews.text: Placed it in my bathroom and looks great. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: A well designed piece
customer_reviews.text: This mirror looks great in our bedroom. It matches our furniture perfectly. it is light weight but looks heavy. It's well designed piece
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Not heavy is well made and looks very high quality
customer_reviews.author: Thelma P

customer_reviews.title: Not High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for because these were fairly inexpensive and are definitely not high quality. Cheap looking, but arrived in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping made Easy

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Was better than expected. Came in perfect condition and looks great in the bathroom. Super easy to install and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Cherise Slover

customer_reviews.title: Not super easy to hang, but nice once in place.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is light weight, and so pretty once in place. I have no complaints about this item, and would def. recommend purchasing, especially as a bathroom mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie D.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this mirror. Came packaged well without any scratches or dents. Quality of materials was good as well. Perfect size and color match for our remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mirrow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirrow based on Good Review. I am so pleased with quality and so surprised with Price! I hanged in powder room, it looks very nice, A+. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Snow Girl

customer_reviews.title: Accurate description
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful installed in an ikea white desk with led sheer curtains behind it.
customer_reviews.author: ChristelTK

customer_reviews.title: Mirror deteriorating within a month
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a small bathroom and needed a basic mirror that would fit the space. It's cheaply made, and there is a little gray spot starting where the mirror is deteriorating (looks like an old old mirror). Waste of money. Going to the garbage and will look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ruebelmann

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good quality for the price. We purchased for a bathroom that needed a mirror but that we plan on renovating in the next 2-3 years. It was easy to hang and looks really nice. I will be repurchasing for our second bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my bathroom and hung them by myself. They are durable and not made cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Limehouse

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I read the frame was not wood that it would look cheap. But it is really nice
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: wall mirror
customer_reviews.text: exceptional mirror! PURCHASED THIS FOR MY NEW BATHROOM MAKEOVER... FITS IN PERFECTLY - GREAT SIZE, WONDERFUL CRAFTSMANSHIP AND A PURE ACCENT IN THE NEW BATH SETTING defiantly WOULD BUY THIS AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Not broke when I received it! Shipping was fast. Looks even better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Moongooddess

customer_reviews.title: Decent looking mirror for the price
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the color or the mirror was flaking off the frame upon opening the package.
customer_reviews.author: dmum89

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Two mirrors were purchased for bathroom vanities. They are the perfect size. Both arrived in perfect condition and look great on the walls. The frame is plastic but looks good and should hold up nicely in a bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Joannie H

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest quality control
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed with the quality of the mirror glass part. Overall, it's a nice mirror, but the top part of the mirror glass has faint scratches or markings all across the top. Too much trouble to return, though.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror with clean lines
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the bedroom. Made well with good hanging hooks in the back The wide white border with a bit of beveling is oerfect
customer_reviews.author: LaLola

customer_reviews.title: This mirror fully exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Of course it always looks different in person, but this mirror is a very nice piece! I was pleasantly surprised! It’s very sturdy and the frame size makes it larger.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Was great quality and used lights on it to make a vanity ..it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: destiny

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Mirror for small Bathroom..Great Price,Nice white Frame around Mirror Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sylvester

customer_reviews.title: White Bevelled Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror arrived very quickly. It was packaged very well and arrived in perfect shape. I love it. Made well too. Just what I needed. Highly recommend especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Garden Lover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as advertised. Beautiful mirror so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mirrors! I ordered two to decorate my bathroom. I will be ordering more for other parts of the house.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeTJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy these at a lower cost than most!
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged, and great value! Doesn't come with hardware to actually hang it, so be prepared grab some screws, etc. We love how it looks!
customer_reviews.author: jbwiney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror, impressive quality
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the quality of this mirror, perfect upgrade for my small bathroom! Been shopping for white bathroom mirror to fit into specific size wall, this mirror is perfect. Beautiful white finish with beveled mirror plus delivered as advertised and in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!! Heavy and looks much more expensive than it is
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful mirror. I never installed it, but I sat it on top of my dresser. It looks great and is actually quite heavy, and it looks much more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror, just was too small for the space ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror, just was too small for the space we needed it for. My fault... I measured incorrectly. If the mirror had been large enough, we definitely would have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have purchased in a while.
customer_reviews.author: lllllll

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mirror and you can't beat the price!! Very much recommend this mirror..it worked out perfect. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: It's a very pretty mirror. Shipping time was great! Packing was great (not-broken). I just think they used the tern "wood frame" in the description pretty loosely. It's not wood. All good, I just changed the way I was going to hang it, and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Seward

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find this size
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, it was the perfect size for a small bathroom. It arrived with a small crack in the corner of the mirror near the frame. I can't be bothered to go through the return process.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mallard

customer_reviews.title: great quality. It's hanging in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: would purchase again, great quality. It's hanging in my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: it is great, but a bit to small
customer_reviews.text: it is great, but a bit to small, but the quality is magnificent. it looks great in a small bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Celia Argabright

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are completely inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: It's not that it's a bad mirror...the measurements are inaccurate. The measurements that are listed are the size of the mirror itself and do not include the frame. The frame adds another 6 inches on the length and width. Maybe I'm dumb, but when a person is looking for the measurements, one would think it would accurately give the measurement of the entire item...very annoying to have to return something so HUGE and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN PENN

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great product for its price. It looks expensive. Solid packaging, beautiful for my guest bathroom. I use wire to connect both side Dring to hang it lengthwise. No issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tangoleash

customer_reviews.title: A Great Mirror for My Space
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mirror to hang in a bathroom. It came out perfect. It looks great. It perfectly fit the space available. It was easy to hang. I am very happy with the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for on my living room wall and they look beautiful. They were very easy to hang and seem ...
customer_reviews.text: I order 2 of them for on my living room wall and they look beautiful. They were very easy to hang and seem to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Two point hangers
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, only problem is that is has two hangers on vertical and horizontal axis so you will need to make sure it is straight before hanging. I moved one hanger to middle to solve that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Yavuz

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had more bathrooms to remodel.
customer_reviews.text: I think the person who priced then didn’t know what they were doing. This thing is way under priced. I would pay for 2 for the price of one!
customer_reviews.author: Ronielle

customer_reviews.title: Problem is that the quality isn't the best and the mirror but it not straight which really ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the first time, came damaged. Ordered a second time, came damaged again. Problem is that the quality isn't the best and the mirror but it not straight which really bugged me. Pass.
customer_reviews.author: dagone12

customer_reviews.title: Glad I went this route.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit above chest of drawers. Matched wood style perfectly. Looked like it went with the bedroom furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P

customer_reviews.title: Nice framed mirror
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is attractive and beveled at edges. Nice touch for over table.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Usiak

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it's a nice mirror.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with the tools to hang it, or that there were hooks at the top corners to hang it rather than in the middle. Other than that it's a nice mirror.
customer_reviews.author: l. t.

customer_reviews.title: Corners don't meet
customer_reviews.text: If it will bother you that the corners don't meet, don't buy this. There is a small gap at each corner. I don't notice it now that it's hung (in kids bathroom)
customer_reviews.author: Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected for the price. I love the frame, fits perfect in my farmhouse/industrial bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Bessey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Nice finish
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Nice finish. Frame has overall bronze effect. Bought 3 to place in basement windows that allowed little outside light. Really help reflect internal light and sense of depth around the basement but nice enough to be used in other areas of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrol D Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Smart Looking
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure what to expect for the price. Looks great in guest bath. Very pleased. Easy to wipe down n keep shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Balkunow

customer_reviews.title: but it does look nice. I bought three for my bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are a steal for the price. I do with the frame was not plastic, but it does look nice. I bought three for my bathrooms, and permanently mounted them on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jcrab200

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror...
customer_reviews.text: I love this purchase. The assembly directions are kind of sketchy so I had a friend of mine help me put it up. There's no real need for a stud finder. It can be place neatly on dry wall.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty mirrors for the money. Really updated the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Great condition. Buy with confidence. Would get again.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best mirror for the price
customer_reviews.text: It looks amazing in my remolded bathroom and I didn't have to pay an arm and a leg for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Roads

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchased because I loved it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Paula C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: Was bought for my aunt and she loves it. She put it in her bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C.

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Have used these in different houses replacing the outdated large builder installed wall mirror
customer_reviews.author: Occasional reader

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our bathroom and looks great in the space!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: obvious plastic frame - way too expensive for the quality
customer_reviews.author: borisdog

product_meta.title: MCS Wall Mirror, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteFrame Molding is made from polystyrene material and the mirror is glass
feature_bullets: The 3 inch wide frame has a sleek and clean white finish
4 D-Ring hangers attached for quick and easy installation either vertically or horizontally
Frame Molding is made from polystyrene material and the mirror is glass

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
